title: Council Directive 89/393/EEC of 14 June 1989 amending for the fifth time Directive 74/329/EEC on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to emulsifiers, stabilizers, thickeners and gelling agents for use in foodstuffs
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE of 14 June 1989 amending for the fifth time Directive 74/329/EEC on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to emulsifiers, stabilizers, thickeners and gelling agents for use in foodstuffs (89/393/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Article 3 (1) of Directive 74/329/EEC, the first subparagraph is hereby replaced by the following:
'1.  By way of derogation from Article 2 (1), Member States may authorize, until 31 December 1991, the use in foodstuffs of the substances listed in Annex II.'
Article 1 shall take effect as from 1 January 1989.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 14 June 1989.
For the Council
The President
P. SOLBES
